notes: ChatVideoPro v2.0 introduces Unified Billing (one API key + in-panel usage tracking), brand-new image & video generation models including VEO 3.1, Kling 2.5 Turbo Pro, Hailuo, Wan, Nano Banana Pro, and Seedream v4, plus built-in AI upscaling and instant background removal. Major workflow & UI upgrades make the panel faster, more stable, and more intelligent than ever.
